arts.ttl: Forgotten Liverpool star makes first appearance in THREE years as Arne Slot rings the changes for Carabao Cup clash with Crystal Palace - and Premier League cult hero's son is named on the bench
arts.sum: The 22-year-old right-back has been named in Arne Slot 's heavily rotated XI for the fourth-round tie, ending an absence of almost three years from the senior side.

arts.sum: Follow Daily Mail Sport's live blog for the latest score, team news and updates from all the action from the fourth-round of the Carabao Cup featuring Liverpool vs Crystal Palace.

arts.sum: Arne Slot’s struggling Reds will attempt to avoid three straight defeats to Crystal Palace and book their spot in the Carabao Cup last eight

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Crystal Palace – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Liverpool host Crystal Palace at Anfield in the fourth round of the Carabao Cup this evening. Arne Slot’s side will want to use cup competition as a route back to form, following a disappointing period in the Premier League. The Reds take on a Crystal Palace side keen for more silverware success, after winning the […] The post Liverpool vs Crystal Palace – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs. Crystal Palace: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Liverpool and Crystal Palace lock horns for the third time this season when they clash in the Carabao Cup fourth round at Anfield on Wednesday evening. Their fourth straight Premier League defeat and fifth loss in their last six matches has alarm bells ringing, with Arne Slot under pressure to turn performances and results around swiftly after the summer’s gargantuan transfer spend.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Crystal Palace – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Liverpool look to put their Premier League woes behind them when Crystal Palace arrive at Anfield in the Carabao Cup on Wednesday night. The champions have lost four consecutive games in the Premier League, as Arne Slot’s side suffer from a mini-crisis. arts.ttl: Crystal Palace XI vs Liverpool – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Crystal Palace travel to Liverpool this evening looking to progress in the Carabao Cup. After the club’s historic FA Cup win last season, a first-ever major trophy for the Eagles, the South Londoners are looking for further glory. Palace head to Anfield to face a Liverpool side in crisis. arts.ttl: Nine players could miss Liverpool vs Crystal Palace as Arne Slot's side look to get back on track
arts.sum: Liverpool will be desperate to return to winning ways when they host Crystal Palace in the Carabao Cup, but Arne Slot could be without a number of star names

arts.ttl: Federico Chiesa backs Liverpool to deal with any long-ball threat in Palace test
arts.sum: Forward says players will perform ‘in any situation’ Crystal Palace visit Anfield in Carabao Cup on Wednesday Federico Chiesa has claimed that Liverpool’s troubles are not long term and Arne Slot’s side will have answers for any long-ball tactics that Crystal Palace employ in the Carabao Cup. Liverpool have lost twice against Palace this season, with the reverse at Selhurst Park last month marking the start of a damaging sequence of five defeats in six games. The teams meet again at Anfield on Wednesday when Slot faces a dilemma over the extent of his rotation, given injuries and recent results. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Two Palace starters, one absentee confirmed by Glasner before Liverpool EFL Cup tie
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner confirms two Crystal Palace starters and one player ruled out through injury ahead of Wednesday’s EFL Cup fourth-round battle with Premier League champions Liverpool at Anfield.
